item.title: 加密货币领导人出席特朗普峰会，战略储备成为焦点
item.description: 美国总统唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）周五在白宫向加密货币行业的精英们示好，主办了一场首届峰会，重点讨论他的政府数字资产储备计划。【原文：U.S. President Donald Trump wooed the cryptocurrency industry's elite at the White House on Friday, hosting a first-of-its-kind summit focused on his plans for a government-owned stockpile of digital assets.】

item.title: 直觉机器公司股票在月球第二次侧面着陆后暴跌
item.description: 在美国太空探索公司证实其第二个月球着陆器 "雅典娜 "号已于一天前着陆，与去年的首次尝试类似之后，直觉机器公司的股价周五大幅下跌，收盘时下跌了22%。【原文：Shares of Intuitive Machines slumped to close 22% lower on Friday after the U.S. space exploration company confirmed that its second moon lander, Athena, landed on its side a day ago, similar to its first attempt last year.】

item.title: 据 Politico 报道，美国卫生部长肯尼迪下周将会见食品公司负责人
item.description: 美国卫生与公众服务部部长小罗伯特-肯尼迪（Robert F. Kennedy Jr.）计划于 3 月 10 日会见通用磨坊（General Mills）和百事可乐（PepsiCo）等知名食品公司的高管。【原文：U.S. Secretary of Health and Human Services Robert F. Kennedy Jr. plans to meet with senior executives from leading food companies like General Mills and PepsiCo on March 10, Politico reported on Saturday, citing people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 前日本央行行长黑田东彦表示，日本必须消除对其操纵日元的 "误解"。
item.description: 日本央行前行长黑田东彦表示，日本必须纠正美国总统唐纳德-特朗普认为日本央行故意通过货币政策削弱日元的 "任何误解"。【原文：Japan must fix "any misunderstanding" held by U.S. President Donald Trump that its central bank was intentionally weakening the yen with monetary policy, former Bank of Japan Governor Haruhiko Kuroda said.】

item.title: 美联储主席发表讲话后，华尔街收盘走高，但周线大跌
item.description: 周五美国股市收高，从早盘的跌势中反弹，此前美联储主席杰罗姆-鲍威尔称经济 "形势良好"，但美国贸易政策的不确定性导致华尔街创下数月来最大单周跌幅。【原文：U.S. stocks finished higher on Friday, rebounding from early declines after Federal Reserve Chair Jerome Powell said the economy was "in a good place," but uncertainty about U.S. trade policy led to Wall Street's biggest weekly decline in months.】

item.title: 戴利：美联储应谨慎慎重地制定利率政策
item.description: 旧金山联邦储备银行行长玛丽-戴利（Mary Daly）周五指出，经济前景存在较大的不确定性，但她表示，由于经济稳健，短期借贷成本 "处于良好位置"，美国央行无需匆忙采取行动。【原文：San Francisco Federal Reserve Bank President Mary Daly on Friday called out the elevated uncertainties around the economic outlook, but said that with the economy solid and short-term borrowing costs "in a good place," the U.S. central bank does not need to make any rushed moves.】

item.title: 巴西国家石油公司将支付 2.83 亿美元解决与 EIG 的美国法庭纠纷
item.description: 巴西国营石油公司 Petrobras 周五表示，其董事会批准了一项协议，以解决与 EIG Energy Fund XIV 的美国法庭纠纷，其中包括巴西公司支付 2.83 亿美元。【原文：Brazilian state-run oil firm Petrobras said on Friday its board approved an agreement to settle a U.S. court dispute with EIG Energy Fund XIV, including a $283 million payment by the Brazilian company.】

item.title: 波音公司将员工激励计划与全公司业绩挂钩
item.description: 今年，波音公司 10 万多名员工的年度奖金将与整个公司的业绩挂钩，而不是像往年那样按业务部门发放。【原文：Annual bonuses for more than 100,000 Boeing employees this year will be tied to company-wide performance, rather than by business unit, as in previous years.】

item.title: 俄罗斯两个地区因担心安全而封杀 Telegram 应用程序
item.description: 塔斯社（TASS）周六援引俄罗斯两个地区数字发展部长的话说，由于担心 Telegram 应用程序可能被敌人使用，这两个地区的当局已经封锁了 Telegram 信使。【原文：Authorities in two Russian regions have blocked the Telegram messenger because of concerns that the app could be used by enemies, a regional digital development minister was quoted as saying by the TASS state news agency on Saturday.】

item.title: 美国放弃要求谷歌在反垄断案中出售人工智能投资
item.description: 美国司法部周五放弃了迫使 Alphabet 旗下谷歌出售其在人工智能公司（包括 OpenAI 竞争对手 Anthropic）的投资，以促进在线搜索领域竞争的提议。【原文：The U.S. Department of Justice on Friday dropped a proposal to force Alphabet's Google to sell its investments in artificial intelligence companies, including OpenAI competitor Anthropic, to boost competition in online search.】

item.title: 超级计算机扩张之际，埃隆-马斯克的 xAI 公司在孟菲斯购置新房产
item.description: 大孟菲斯商会（Greater Memphis Chamber）周五表示，埃隆-马斯克（Elon Musk）旗下的人工智能公司xAI已在田纳西州孟菲斯西南部购买了一处100万平方英尺的房产，这家初创公司希望在行业竞争加剧的情况下扩大其人工智能基础设施。【原文：Elon Musk-owned artificial intelligence firm xAI has bought a 1-million-square-foot property in Southwest Memphis, Tennessee, the Greater Memphis Chamber said on Friday, as the startup looks to expand its AI infrastructure amid intensifying competition in the industry.】

item.title: 美国关税影响预期，惠普企业股价暴跌
item.description: 惠普企业公司（Hewlett Packard Enterprise）股价周五下跌 13%，此前这家人工智能服务器制造商表示，在激烈的市场竞争中，其年度利润预期将受到美国关税的冲击。【原文：Shares of Hewlett Packard Enterprise fell 13% on Friday, after the AI-server maker said its annual profit forecast would be hit by U.S. tariffs in an intensely competitive market.】

item.title: 美国监管机构为银行参与某些加密货币活动扫清障碍
item.description: 美国监管国家银行的监管机构周五澄清说，银行可以从事一些加密货币活动，并取消了企业在这样做之前应事先获得监管机构许可的预期。【原文：The U.S. regulator overseeing national banks clarified Friday that banks can engage in some crypto activities, and removed expectations firms should receive advance permission from regulators before doing so.】

item.title: 供应链软件公司 Logility 收到主动出价，每股 15 美元
item.description: 人工智能驱动的软件制造商 Logility Supply Chain Solutions 周五表示，该公司收到了一份主动提议，以每股 15 美元的价格收购其全部流通股。【原文：AI-powered software maker Logility Supply Chain Solutions said on Friday it had received an unsolicited proposal to acquire all of its outstanding shares for $15 a piece.】

item.title: 美国国务院雇员被控共享敏感信息
item.description: 根据一份刑事起诉书，美国司法部周五宣布对一名国务院雇员提出刑事指控，该雇员被控与他在网上认识的人共享敏感的政府信息。【原文：The U.S. Justice Department on Friday announced criminal charges against a State Department employee accused of sharing sensitive government information with people he met online, according to a criminal complaint.】

item.title: 五角大楼软件购买流程转向更多访问权限
item.description: 美国国防部正在改变购买软件的方式，希望更多地接触商业和非传统软件供应商，因为五角大楼希望迅速实现武器和业务系统的现代化。【原文：The U.S. Department of Defense is shifting how it buys software eyeing greater access to commercial and non-traditional software providers as the Pentagon hopes to rapidly modernize its weapons and business systems.】

item.title: 特朗普签署建立比特币战略储备的命令
item.description: 美国总统唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）签署了一项行政命令，利用政府已经拥有的代币建立加密货币战略储备，这让市场上一些希望制定购买新代币的坚定计划的人感到失望。【原文：U.S. President Donald Trump has signed an executive order to establish a strategic reserve of cryptocurrencies by using tokens already owned by the government, disappointing some in the market who had hoped for a firm plan to buy new tokens.】

item.title: 就业数据亮起潜在红灯，美联储有望在 6 月降息
item.description: 美联储将于 3 月 18-19 日召开政策会议，届时劳动力市场总体强劲，但可能会出现一些疲软的早期迹象，如果通胀率居高不下，而特朗普政府的关税又加剧了物价压力，那么美国央行可能会陷入困境。【原文：The Federal Reserve will head into its March 18-19 policy meeting with the labor market strong overall but showing some potential early signs of weakening, a development that could put the U.S. central bank in a tough spot if inflation remains high and the Trump administration's tariffs add to price pressures.】

item.title: 摩根士丹利因关税担忧下调美国 2025 年经济增长预期
item.description: 摩根士丹利周五下调了对美国2025年经济增长的预期，理由是关税带来的影响更大，以及劳动力市场仍然紧张导致通胀率上升。【原文：Morgan Stanley lowered its 2025 economic growth forecast for the United States on Friday, citing greater impact from tariffs and a still-tight labor market resulting in higher inflation.】

item.title: 美国不顾反对，批准为马斯克的 "星链 "提供更高功率的手机服务
item.description: 美国联邦通信委员会周五表示，将允许埃隆-马斯克（Elon Musk）的 SpaceX 旗下公司 Starlink 以更高的功率水平与 T-Mobile 运营直达蜂窝服务，尽管竞争对手公司提出了反对意见。【原文：The U.S. Federal Communications Commission on Friday said it would allow Starlink, a unit of Elon Musk's SpaceX, to operate a direct-to-cell service with T-Mobile at higher power levels despite objections by rival companies.】

item.title: 据《华尔街日报》报道，激进投资者 Mantle Ridge 持有 Cognizant 超过 10 亿美元的股份
item.description: 据《华尔街日报》周五报道，激进投资者 Mantle Ridge 已持有咨询公司 Cognizant Technology 价值超过 10 亿美元的股份，称其股价被低估。【原文：Activist investor Mantle Ridge has built a stake worth more than $1 billion in consultancy firm Cognizant Technology , saying its shares are undervalued, the Wall Street Journal reported on Friday.】

item.title: Hims & Hers 将关闭皮肤科业务 Apostrophe
item.description: Hims & Hers Health 公司周五表示，将终止其个性化痤疮治疗皮肤科业务 Apostrophe。【原文：Hims & Hers Health would discontinue Apostrophe, its personalized acne treatments dermatology business, the company said on Friday.】

item.title: 据 The Information 报道，微软正在开发人工智能推理模型，与 OpenAI 竞争
item.description: 据 The Information 周五援引一位参与此计划的人士的话报道，微软正在开发内部人工智能推理模型，以与 OpenAI 竞争，并可能将其出售给开发者。【原文：Microsoft is developing in-house artificial intelligence reasoning models to compete with OpenAI and may sell them to developers, The Information reported on Friday, citing a person involved in this initiative.】

item.title: 苹果公司称 Siri 的部分人工智能改进将推迟到 2026 年
item.description: 苹果公司周五表示，对语音助手 Siri 的一些人工智能改进将推迟到 2026 年。【原文：Some artificial intelligence improvements to Apple's voice assistant Siri will be delayed until 2026, the company said on Friday.】

item.title: 消息人士称，美国正酝酿禁止政府设备使用中国应用程序 DeepSeek
item.description: 一位熟悉此事的人士周五表示，出于国家安全考虑，特朗普政府正在权衡禁止中国人工智能聊天机器人 DeepSeek 在美国政府设备上使用。【原文：The Trump administration is weighing a ban on Chinese AI chatbot DeepSeek from U.S. government devices over national-security concerns, a person familiar with the matter said on Friday.】

item.title: 美国将就中国推动半导体产业发展的努力举行听证会
item.description: 美国贸易代表办公室将于周二就中国制造的老式 "传统 "半导体举行听证会，美国可能会对来自中国的芯片征收更多关税，这些芯片为从汽车、洗衣机到电信设备等日常用品提供动力。【原文：The U.S. Trade Representative's Office will hold a hearing on Tuesday into older Chinese-made "legacy" semiconductors that could heap more U.S. tariffs on chips from China that power everyday goods from autos to washing machines to telecoms gear.】

item.title: 欧盟否认挑衅美国科技巨头，称美国也在处理垄断问题
item.description: 欧盟反垄断和技术部门负责人告诉美国国会议员，欧洲新的技术规则旨在保持数字市场的开放，并非针对美国科技巨头，并提醒他们美国执法人员近年来也对这些公司进行了打击。【原文：Europe's new tech rule aims to keep digital markets open and is not targeted at U.S. tech giants, EU antitrust and tech chiefs told U.S. congressmen, reminding them that U.S. enforcers have in recent years also cracked down on these companies.】

item.title: 高级官员称特朗普政府将比特币储备视为 "数字诺克斯堡"
item.description: 美国总统唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）政府的高级官员在周五的媒体吹风会上表示，随着白宫推进建立数字资产储备的计划，他们认为比特币值得 "特殊对待"。【原文：Senior officials of the administration of U.S. president Donald Trump said in a media briefing on Friday that they view bitcoin as deserving "special treatment" as the White House forges ahead with plans to create stockpiles of digital assets.】

item.title: 美国议员就与军方和政府的关系向中国电信施压
item.description: 美国众议院一个小组的领导人呼吁中国顶级电信公司详细说明与中国军方和政府的任何联系，理由是这些公司在美国的存在造成了国家安全问题。【原文：The leaders of a U.S. House of Representatives panel have called on top Chinese telecom companies to detail any links to the Chinese military and government, citing national security concerns posed by the companies' U.S. presence.】

item.title: 巴西最高法院分庭多数法官维持隆隆停职令
item.description: 巴西最高法院五人合议庭周五形成多数，维持了一名法官之前做出的裁决，即暂停美国视频共享平台 Rumble 在巴西的业务，原因是该平台未遵守法院命令。【原文：The majority of a five-member panel of Brazil's Supreme Court formed a majority on Friday to uphold a justice's previous ruling to suspend U.S. video-sharing platform Rumble in the country for not complying with court orders.】
